title: Just a casual repost of: Just a casual reminder that permanently banning me doesnt work.
body:
So you permabanned me for raging back at some really toxic players, Within 5 minutes i had a brand spanking new account that i bought from [REMOVED], and off i went, im currently 3 wins /10 in my placements and already a higher rank than this account.

Ive, lost, Nothing.

And dont even bother deleting this post again, because ill just keep reposting it for the lols, accounts already perma'd you cant do shit.

replies.body: Your post wasn't deleted? We don't stop players reporting themselves, only other people.
Account bought from PA will be banned in a month or two when they do sweeping bans of botted accounts.

see youd be correct if the account im posting on now wasnt a bought account.

This isnt my first rodeo with permabans.

A name that more people would remember me by is yellowbrickroad top kek.
